oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ixa-pipe-dep-eu
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
ixa-pipe-dep-eu is a Basque dependency parsing tool.
It is based on MATE-tools. This tool takes a document in Natural Language Processing Annotation Format (NAF) format (http://wordpress.let.vupr.nl/naf/) and outputs a new NAF document.
This tool is partly funded by the European Commission project QTLeap FP7-ICT-2013.4.1-610516 (http://qtleap.eu). This tool is distributed under the license GPL v3.0.
